description: Take on everything from single track training to jeep road crushers in the smooth and ultra-lightweight fit of our redesigned ¼ running sock. Its added ankle coverage sports silky next-to-skin ribbing, with breathable flex zones in the forefoot and fatigue-zapping arch support.
name: Darn Tough Socks Run 1/4 Ultralight Socks - Mens

specs.value: Running shoes, trail runners, athletic sneakers
